title: Bontrager’s GR Elite alloy gravel bar tames hand fatigue w/ built-in Iso Zone
content:
Not all drop bars excel in every riding style — most would have a different setup for a crit race and a gravel ride. Bontrager feels the same but takes a less exaggerated approach than most to the subject. What is it — Bontrager GR Elite Gravel Bar Bontrager’s new GR Elite gravel bar (GR […]

The post Bontrager’s GR Elite alloy gravel bar tames hand fatigue w/ built-in Iso Zone appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
